project_descr: National Oil & Gas Authority - Assistance to Prepare a Study on Energy Conservation Potentiality and Feasibility for Establishing an Energy Conservation and Planning Centre for Bahrain

outputs.output_descr: Study the Energy Conservation potentiality and develop a feasibility study for NOGA for the establishment of a Center for Energy Conservation and Planning over the short, medium and long terms, that could operate in a cost effective and efficient manner using state of the art approach. Formulate a Project Document for the provision of technical assistance by UNDP.
